name: pieforproviders
description: A digital assistant for your child care business.
author: Kate Donaldson <kate@katelovescode.com>

scripts.build: echo 'I am building this!' && cd client && yarn install && yarn build && cd ..
scripts.deploy: echo 'I am deploying this!' && cp -a client/build/. public/
scripts.postinstall: echo 'I am postinstalling this!' && yarn build && yarn deploy && echo 'Client built!'
